title: Science communication best practice: SlowMemo
content: Self-guided museum activities to engage with our past and present Slow memory is an emergent concept that offers a new angle to reflect on how societies and individuals remember the pasts that meaningfully affects their present and future. It begins from the premise that we are familiar with commemorating sudden or extreme events such as wars, atrocities, or catastrophes but we are less certain ab
creator: Lorna Stokes
